sections.heading: authority; prepare statement.Before delivering any bonds, the authority shall prepare a written statement under oath setting forth its proceedings authorizing the issuance of the bonds and a copy of the trust or other bond agreement executed in connection with such bonds

sections.text:
14-1717.Parking authority; prepare statement.

Before delivering any bonds, the authority shall prepare a written statement under oath setting forth its proceedings authorizing the issuance of the bonds and a copy of the trust or other bond agreement executed in connection with such bonds.

SourceLaws 1955, c. 22, ยง 17, p. 111;Laws 2001, LB 420, ยง 16;Laws 2022, LB800, ยง 301.
